content:
With your classic and professional work style, a sleek black leather tote would be a fantastic addition to your wardrobe. Here are some great options to consider at Nordstrom:

1. **Tory Burch Robinson Tote**: A timeless and sophisticated choice, this tote features a structured design, gold-tone hardware, and a spacious interior. It's a great investment piece that will last for years to come. ($595)
2. **Kate Spade New York Cameron Street Lacey Tote**: This tote has a slightly more modern take on the classic design, with a clean silhouette and a touch of elegance. The leather is high-quality, and the gold-tone hardware adds a nice touch. ($498)
3. **Coach Parker Tote**: Coach is a great brand for high-quality leather goods, and this tote is no exception. It has a sleek, modern design with a structured shape and a spacious interior. The silver-tone hardware adds a touch of sophistication. ($395)
4. **Madewell Transport Tote**: If you're looking for a more affordable option, Madewell's Transport Tote is a great choice. It's made from high-quality leather and has a classic, timeless design that will work well with your neutral-colored work clothes. ($198)
5. **Longchamp Le Pliage Cuir Tote**: This French brand is known for its high-quality leather goods, and this tote is a great option if you're looking for a more understated design. The Le Pliage collection is known for its durability and water-resistant material. ($395)

All of these options are high-quality, well-made leather totes that will complement your classic and professional work style. Since you mentioned you're looking for a sleek, black tote, I've focused on options that fit that description. However, if you'd like to explore other colors or styles, feel free to let me know!

Which one of these options resonates with you, or would you like me to suggest a few more?
